title.rendered: How to Finish Everything You Start

content.rendered:
How to Finish Everything You Start is just the book you need to get more done! This book will help you in understanding the causes of the “unfinished” epidemic, its cures, and when choosing not to finish something is okay. By focusing on this one key issue that is sabotaging so many today in their quest to be more productive at work, and to have a more satisfying personal life, you are more likely to:

  • Understand what is behind your occasional or chronic reluctance to finish
  • Apply the author’s unique F-I-N-I-S-H systematic approach to get more done
  • Complete priority projects or tasks
  • Be more confident if you do put something aside it is for the right reasons

and lots more…
